source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_000<tab>We would like for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, to do the honors and choose who would be best suited to take center stage at the performance!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_000冒険者さんに、今回の公演の中央……つまり、
主役に誰を据えるかを決めていただきたいのです！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_001<tab>As a world-renowned adventurer, you no doubt have an eye for talent and would know which of the girls the audience desires most to see take the lead!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_001我々より、お客さまに近い目線を持っているはずですし、
何より、今回お手伝いいただいた中で、
3人の意外な側面を見たかと思うのです。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_002<tab>I already pulled the Songbirds aside and explained to each of them that you would be the one making this most difficult decision. As such, I ask that you inform the girl of your choice directly. They would be much more thrilled to hear the news from you than me.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_002すでにこのことは、3人には話してありますので、
主役にふさわしいと思うメンバーが決まりましたら、
その者に声をかけてくださいね。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_003<tab>With things drawing to a close, I can say with confidence that all the hurdles we encountered along the way have made this moment that much more special. This Little Ladies' Day will certainly be one to remember!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_003新衣装お披露目公演ですが、
評判も大変良いようで、何よりです。
本当にありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_004<tab>That said, the festival is not quite yet over, so please, my friend, go forth and enjoy what the remainder of this most delightful of seasons has to offer. Oh, and don't forget the Songbirds will continue to put on performances, so should the fancy strike you, be sure to pay their stage a visit!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_004プリンセスデーの期間中は、
引き続き舞台で公演を行いますので、
ぜひ再び「三歌姫」の様子を見にきてくださいね！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_005<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Even in my weakest moments, knowing that we can count on your continued support fills me with strength!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_BUTLER_000_005手間をかけさせてしまいますが、
どうかよろしくお願いいたします！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ULALA_000_010<tab>Did you see them, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─all the people entranced by my magical performance? Haha! I'll make fans of all Eorzea yet!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ULALA_000_010新しい衣装での公演、どうだったかしら？
このままウララパワー全開で、
エオルゼアのみ～んなを魅了しちゃうんだからっ☆

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_NARUMI_000_011<tab>H-How do you think we did? The moment I stepped out on that stage, I was struck by such a terrible bout of nerves that my mind went completely blank! I hope I didn't make any mistakes!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_NARUMI_000_011公演、いかがでしたか？
期待に沿えていればいいのですが……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_012<tab>I couldn't be happier with these gorgeous costumes or the massive turnout! I can only hope the audience was just as pleased by our performance!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_012アタシたちの新衣装お披露目公演、どうだったかしら？
待っていてくれていたお客さんや、見に来てくださった方を、
少しでも元気付けることができたなら何よりなのだけれど。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ULALA_000_020<tab>No need for words, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I can already tell what you're thinking! You simply couldn't tear your eyes away from the stage, could you? Not that I can't blame you, of course! With me dancing center stage, not a single person could!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ULALA_000_020新しい衣装での公演、どうだったかしら？
)) (( )) 02 /var>がウララを主役に選んでくれたおかげで、
かわいさ全開の公演だったでしょ！？

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ULALA_000_021<tab>This, however, is just the beginning! Soon people from all corners of the realm will flock to our stages to gaze upon their favorite new star!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ULALA_000_021でも、まだまだこれからよ……！
このまま、ウララパワー全開で、
エオルゼアのみ～んなを魅了しちゃうんだからっ☆

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_NARUMI_000_022<tab>What did you think of our performance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Did it live up to your expectations?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_NARUMI_000_022公演、いかがでしたか？
せっかく)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに主役に選んでいただいたので、
期待に沿えていればいいのですが……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_NARUMI_000_023<tab>What a relief! I promise you we will continue doing our best and bring smiles to the people's faces─one Eorzean at a time, if that's what it takes!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_NARUMI_000_023ひとりでも多くの方を笑顔にできるよう、
引き続き、精一杯がんばっていくので、
これからも「三歌姫」のこと、見守っていてくださいね！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_024<tab>In the days and nights leading up to our big performance, I had been running all the steps and notes through my mind and, based upon the crowd's reaction, I daresay it paid off!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_024アタシたちの新衣装お披露目公演、どうだったかしら？
主役に選んでもらったからには、と思って、
普段以上にキレよく踊ってみたつもりなのだけれど。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_025<tab>Haha! I don't know what I was so worried for. They loved us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─and it's all thanks to you!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_025待っていてくれていたお客さんや、見に来てくださった方、
そして、アタシを主役に選んでくれた)) (( )) 02 /var>さんを、
少しでも元気付けることができたなら何よりだわ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_030<tab>Aha! Don't think I can't recognize a fellow fan when I see one! Tell me, don't you just love, love, <var 1A 02 /var>love<var 1A 01 /var> the Songbirds?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_030うっひょ～！　「三歌姫」は本当に最高だよ！
あなたも勿論、そう思うだろ！？
いやぁ、実に素晴らしい……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_Q1_100_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_Q1_100_000<tab>どの話を教えてもらう？

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_A1_100_001<tab>What do you do here?
target: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_A1_100_001<tab>あなたはここで何をしているの？

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_A1_200_008<tab>What is Little Ladies' Day?
target: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_A1_200_008<tab>そもそも「プリンセスデー」とは？

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_A1_100_009<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_A1_100_009<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_040<tab>Haha! I know you─you're a fellow fan. No need to be shy about it! I've seen you following the girls, going so far as to traverse the three city<var 1F /var>states even to meet them. Tee hee hee! How do I know? Truth be told, I've been keeping an eye on them too!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_040何を隠そう、彼女たちの追っかけさ！
……ここだけの話だけど、僕は彼女たちの会話や仕草を、
すべて完璧に覚えているのさ……フッフッフッ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_041<tab>Seeing as you're a kindred soul, I'll let you in on a little secret. While we're all fans here, I'm their most devoted follower and, as such, have made it a point to go wherever they may go and note down their every word and gesture. Hehe!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_041キミのことだって知っているさ！
街を駆け回って、彼女たちの宣伝をしている姿を見てたからね。
同じファンとして、僕も鼻が高いよ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_042<tab>I've been a fan from before the Songbirds grew their wings and took to the skies! While most of their other followers love them for their success, I'm different. I love them for their courage and passion! They do everything they can to make the realm a more joyous place. Why, they even performed at the Starlight celebration last year for the orphans!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_042彼女たちってば、活動の幅を着実に広げているんだ。
先日の星芒祭でも、祭りを盛り上げるために活動していたし……
くぅ～、今後の飛躍が楽しみでしょうがないよ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_050<tab>You claim to be a fan of the Songbirds and yet you don't know the first thing about Little Ladies' Day!? For shame, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! This simply won't do!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_050なんだい、「プリンセスデー」のことを知りたいのか？
この祝祭を知らずして、「三歌姫」を語るべからず！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_051<tab>Ahem. Little Ladies' Day is the one day a year we celebrate the young maidens that bring such joy to all reaches of the realm. This most wondrous of celebrations can be traced back three centuries past, to a time when the Thorne Dynasty still reigned in Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_051「プリンセスデー」とは、すべての女の子のための祝祭だ。
その起源は遡ること300年ほど昔……
ウルダハの王朝がソーン朝だった時代のことさ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_052<tab>Princess Edvya, being the plucky young girl she was, grew disenchanted with palace life and decided one day to see what the other side of the castle walls had to offer. Finding the opportunity to do so by exchanging garb with a miller girl, she slipped off into the town in search of an adventure.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_052窮屈な王宮生活に嫌気が差した王女「エドヴィア」は、
同年代の町娘から服を借りて変装し、王宮を抜け出したんだ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_053<tab>It didn't take long for the inhabitants of the palace to realize she had gone missing and upon learning of her disappearance, her father─Sultan Baldric Thorne─was stricken with panic. Summoning his entire guard, he ordered they find and return his precious daughter before any harm befell her─even if it meant tearing the city apart.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_053それを知った時の国王「バルドリック」は狼狽しちゃってさ。
姫を探すために軍を総動員して、大騒動になったそうだよ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_054<tab>...And thus the city was torn apart, with the miller's house bearing the brunt of this terrible assault. The poor man whose daughter aided the princess's flight could do naught more than watch as they ripped his house to pieces and pelted his family with threats of imprisonment and worse.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_054軍による度を超した捜索で、当然、街は大混乱。
姫に協力した町娘の家にいたっては半壊しちゃってね。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_055<tab>To the good fortune of all, the princess was soon found just outside the palace walls and once she was safely returned to him did the sultan realize the grave mistake he had made. Ashamed and wishing to make amends, not only did he order that his finest craftsmen rebuild the miller's house from the ground up; he offered to make recompense by personally serving as seneschal to the miller girl for a day.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_055ただ、この事件の後に「バルドリック王」は町娘を訪ねて、
「女の子は国の宝であり、王女として遇されるべき」と謝罪……
家を再建させ、自らは町娘に執事として一日かしずいたそうだ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_056<tab>The smallfolk were deeply moved by this unforeseen display of humility and seeing that, Sultan Baldric─in a vow to never forget the lesson he learned that day─declared that each year he would serve as seneschal to a common girl who was to be chosen by the townsfolk by lot.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_056王の行動に当時の庶民は大喜び、王室に好印象を持ってさ。
それを受けた「バルドリック王」は、毎年同じ日に、
抽選で選ばれた女の子の執事となり、一日中仕えたんだ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_057<tab>Even in his death, the tradition continued, living on as the Thorne Dynasty gave way to the House of Ul. In time, it spread to the other nations, where it grew in popularity and came to be the Little Ladies' Day festival that we all know and love today.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2017SHARE_00377_ADORINGFAN_000_057王の没後も、この珍行事はすこしずつ姿を変えながら、
ウル朝となったウルダハのみならず、他国にも広がっていった。
これが、現在の「プリンセスデー」になったんだぜ！
